name: Hamayumi
desc: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.
skill_desc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% and Charged Attack DMG by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.
